name: 2d Shooter (Roshan27)
description:
This is my 2d Shooter Project. I added multiple changes such as changing speeds for individual shooters and chasers, adding a new challenge which is instead of killing just the ones that first appear, you kill a certain number of them on each level. This also makes the level harder. I also made it so that the fire rate gets slower as you go up the levels for even more of a challenge. I made the Main Menu a bit different as well. Another thing that changes is how fast the spawners spawn the enemies. I hope you enjoy!

The last level is the hardest if you're up for it :D
